name: R4: Ridge Racer Type 4
summary: R4: Ridge Racer Type 4 is the fourth game in the Ridge Racer series. It includes eight tracks (with reverse variants, for a total of 16 layouts) and 321 vehicles, all of which are fictional. This iteration was one of the first PlayStation titles to feature Gouraud shading on polygons, giving the game a visual depth that was previously missing. It was also the first Ridge Racer game on the system to feature two-player split-screen mode and offered two different driving models.

name: R4: Ridge Racer Type 4
summary: A port of R4: Ridge Racer Type 4, originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: R4YL: Run for your life!
summary: R4YL (RUN FOR YOUR LIFE!) is a thrilling infinite runner! Explore mysterious environments, dodge obstacles, and collect treasure as you push your limits. With stunning visuals, dynamic gameplay, and leaderboards, immerse yourself in this action-packed adventure. Will you become the ultimate runner?
